titleStmt.title: The praise and vertue of a iayle, and iaylers With the most excellent mysterie, and necessary vse of all sorts of hanging. Also a touch at Tyburne for a period, and the authors free leaue to let them be hanged, who are offended at the booke without cause. By Iohn Taylor.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I[ohn] H[aviland] for R[ichard] B[adger],

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The vertue of a iayle, and necessitie of hanging.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Title page mutilated; A3 repaired with some blurring of print; cropped at fore-edge.
